org.hibernate.shards.query
Interface QueryEvent

All Known Implementing Classes:
SetBigDecimalEvent, SetBigIntegerEvent, SetBinaryEvent, SetBooleanEvent, SetByteEvent, SetCacheableEvent, SetCacheModeEvent, SetCacheRegionEvent, SetCalendarDateEvent, SetCalendarEvent, SetCharacterEvent, SetCommentEvent, SetDateEvent, SetDoubleEvent, SetEntityEvent, SetFetchSizeEvent, SetFirstResultEvent, SetFloatEvent, SetFlushModeEvent, SetIntegerEvent, SetLocaleEvent, SetLockModeEvent, SetLongEvent, SetMaxResultsEvent, SetParameterEvent, SetParameterListEvent, SetParametersEvent, SetPropertiesEvent, SetReadOnlyEvent, SetResultTransformerEvent, SetSerializableEvent, SetShortEvent, SetStringEvent, SetTextEvent, SetTimeEvent, SetTimeoutEvent, SetTimestampEvent
public interface QueryEvent

Interface for events that can be lazily applied to a Query. Useful because we don't allocate a Query until we actually need it, and programmers might be calling a variety of methods against ShardedQueryImpl which need to be applied to the actual Query when it is allocated.

Author:
Maulik Shah

Method Summary
 void onEvent(org.hibernate.Query query)
          Apply the event

Parameters:
query - the Query to apply the event to
